theCatGirl:Parry.NAME: Parry
theCatGirl:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Deal !D! Damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Evade.

theCatGirl:PlayAround.NAME: Play Around
theCatGirl:PlayAround.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Strikes deal 2 more damage to this enemy.

theCatGirl:ElegantStrike.NAME: Elegant Strike
theCatGirl:ElegantStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for each Evade. NL Exhaust.

theCatGirl:AllIn.NAME: All In
theCatGirl:AllIn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Vulnerable.

theCatGirl:FocusedStrike.NAME: Focused Strike
theCatGirl:FocusedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If you have Evade, gain !M! [R] and draw !theCatGirl:SecondMagic! card.

theCatGirl:PoisedAttack.NAME: Poised Attack
theCatGirl:PoisedAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Upgrade a random Skill in your hand for the rest of the combat.
theCatGirl:PoisedAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Upgrade all Skills in your hand for the rest of the combat.

theCatGirl:DefensiveStance.NAME: Defensive Stance
theCatGirl:DefensiveStance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Evade. Increase the Evade gained by this card by !theCatGirl:SecondMagic!. NL Exhaust.

theCatGirl:TwoStep.NAME: Two-Step
theCatGirl:TwoStep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. At your next turn, gain !M! Evade.

theCatGirl:AdaptivePacing.NAME: Adaptive Pacing
theCatGirl:AdaptivePacing.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Reduce this card's cost by !M! this combat.

theCatGirl:Prepared.NAME: Prepared
theCatGirl:Prepared.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Skill is played twice.
theCatGirl:Prepared.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! Skills are played twice.

theCatGirl:EmergencyParry.NAME: Emergency Parry
theCatGirl:EmergencyParry.DESCRIPTION: Lose all your Evade and gain Block equal to it.
theCatGirl:EmergencyParry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose all your Evade and gain Block equal to !M! times the amount.

theCatGirl:ChangeOfPlans.NAME: Change Of Plans
theCatGirl:ChangeOfPlans.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
theCatGirl:ChangeOfPlans.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

theCatGirl:KeepAlert.NAME: Keep Alert
theCatGirl:KeepAlert.DESCRIPTION: Your Evade is not lost at the end this turn.

theCatGirl:AdventurersInsight.NAME: Adventurer's Insight
theCatGirl:AdventurersInsight.DESCRIPTION: If you attack an enemy that intends to attack, gain !M! Evade.
theCatGirl:AdventurersInsight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you attack an enemy that intends to attack, gain !M! Evade. NL Innate.

theCatGirl:PoiseStance.NAME: Poise Stance
theCatGirl:PoiseStance.DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of your turn, gain !M! Evade.

theCatGirl:Counterattack.NAME: Counterattack
theCatGirl:Counterattack.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Evade, deal !M! damage to all enemies.

theCatGirl:Claws.NAME: Claws
theCatGirl:Claws.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to a random enemy. Claws deal 2 more damage to that enemy.

theCatGirl:ClawScratch.NAME: Claw Scratch
theCatGirl:ClawScratch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Attack played this turn.

theCatGirl:CatGirlUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theCatGirl:CatGirlUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theCatGirl:CatGirlRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theCatGirl:CatGirlRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theCatGirl:CatGirlRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theCatGirl:CatGirlRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theCatGirl:CatGirlRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theCatGirl:CatGirlAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theCatGirl:CatGirlAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [R] times. NL (Deal !theCatGirl:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theCatGirl:CatGirlSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theCatGirl:CatGirlSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theCatGirl:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
